name: Game Boy Platformer
description:
Controlls:

Walk: Left and Right Arrows, Numerical Keyboard 4 and 6, A and D, DPad Left and Right,Left Joystick.

Jump: W,Arrow Up,8 on Numerical Keyboard,Space,X on PlayStation Controller,A on Xbox Controller,B on Nintendo Switch Controller.

Restart: R,Traingle on PlayStation Controller,Y on Xbox Controller,X on Nintendo Switch Controller
